chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Aaron D Nauber was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aaron D Nauber

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: No Appearance by Defendant.  Defendant has made payment arrangements.  Court orders Warrant - stay pending compliance with Payment Plan Agreement.

ADDRESS INFO for Aaron D Nauber
Current: 1344 Oneida St  #1/2, Menasha, WI 54952-1602 United States  (Effective: 04-11-2016)
Prior: 113 Arthur St, Kaukauna, WI 54130
Reminder Notice mailed to Defendant has been returned.  Return to Sender.  Re-mailed to: 1344 Oneida St  #1/2, Menasha WI 54952-1602

10:15 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - upon plea to count 1 and 2, with no repeater, will recommend a fine on count 1, court costs on count 2 and will dismiss 2015TR730.  Defendant concurs.  State concurs.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty to counts 1 & 2.  Court strikes the repeater and orders 2015TR730 be dismissed.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

COUNT 1 - $150 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.  Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

COUNT 2 - court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.  Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 10:22 a.m.

8:58 a.m. Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond.  Court will set for Status Hearing on August 25, 2015 at 9:15 a.m.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY  on behalf of the defendant to 2015TR730.

Court adjourned at 9:00 a.m.
